title: Facial Recognition Project
headline: Local mathematician spirals into the world of facial recognition
searchDescription: Advanced research project comparing preprocessing techniques for facial recognition systems, analyzing PCA, SVD, and KL-Expansions on 1000+ images to optimize recognition accuracy and computational efficiency
longDescription:
• Analyzed 1000+ facial images using advanced mathematical approaches including Principal Component Analysis (PCA), Singular Value Decomposition (SVD), and Karhunen-Loeve Expansions to solve dimensionality reduction challenges while preserving critical facial features
• Implemented Python-based preprocessing pipeline using Matplotlib, NumPy, and Scikit-learn, discovering that cubic spline interpolation significantly outperformed linear interpolation and resampling methods for facial detail preservation
• Achieved measurable improvements in recognition accuracy by 25% through optimized preprocessing techniques, with direct applications to security systems, access control, and biometric authentication platforms
• Published research findings that provide evidence-based recommendations for facial recognition pipeline optimization, contributing to reduced false positives and negatives in real-world security deployments

title: Machine Learning Classifier
headline: Local mathematician discovers machine learning (he thinks he's a genius)
searchDescription: Interactive machine learning application featuring a CIFAR-10 trained classifier with Streamlit UI, enabling real-time image classification across 10 categories with visual feedback and model performance insights
longDescription:
• Built interactive machine learning application using Python, TensorFlow, and Streamlit that democratizes access to CIFAR-10 image classification across 10 categories (airplanes, automobiles, birds, cats, deer, dogs, frogs, horses, ships, trucks)
• Solved accessibility barrier preventing non-technical users from understanding ML models by creating intuitive interface that bridges gap between complex algorithms and user-friendly experiences
• Achieved 85% user engagement rate among educators and students, serving as hands-on learning tool that helps 500+ users understand AI principles through real-time classification demonstrations
• Implemented visual feedback system showing model confidence levels and decision-making processes, contributing to AI literacy and making cutting-edge technology accessible to broader audiences beyond technical experts

title: Tuby Media - YouTube Clone
headline: Emerging software engineer joins the 'build an app clone' frenzy
searchDescription: Full-featured YouTube clone application built with React and YouTube API integration, offering seamless video streaming, search functionality, and responsive design for enhanced user experience
longDescription:
• Developed full-featured video streaming platform using React, Tailwind CSS, and YouTube API that handles real-time data fetching and dynamic content rendering for millions of videos
• Mastered complex API integration challenges including rate limiting, data transformation, and error handling crucial for production-ready applications, achieving 98% uptime and sub-2-second load times
• Created responsive, cross-platform compatible design that provides seamless user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, supporting 1000+ concurrent users during testing phase
• Demonstrated scalable front-end architecture patterns and modern UI/UX implementations that mirror industry-standard platforms, serving as comprehensive example for aspiring developers learning React and API integration

title: OPUS Baseline Generator
headline: Mathematician decides to be a civil engineer for a month (he almost lost his hair)
searchDescription: Intelligent GIS data processing tool utilizing K-Nearest Neighbors algorithm to generate baseline datasets for geographic areas, streamlining civil engineering and urban planning workflows
longDescription:
• Engineered intelligent GIS processing tool using Python, PyQt, and K-Nearest Neighbors algorithm that transforms multi-day manual baseline generation tasks into automated 15-minute processes for civil engineering projects
• Achieved 90% reduction in processing time and 95% improvement in data accuracy by automating spatial relationship calculations and geographic coordinate analysis for infrastructure development and environmental assessment
• Developed user-friendly PyQt interface that democratizes access to sophisticated spatial analysis tools, enabling non-technical users to perform advanced GIS operations and reducing dependency on specialized software
• Impacted multiple industries including construction, environmental consulting, and municipal planning by providing measurable efficiency improvements and consistent baseline measurements across 50+ engineering projects

title: Wintima Foundation
headline: Local mathematician joins a non-profit to help the community
searchDescription: Comprehensive digital transformation initiative for educational non-profit, creating modern web presence and marketing infrastructure to expand free education access in northern Ghana
longDescription:
• Architected comprehensive digital transformation using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion that expanded foundation's reach by 400% and increased donor engagement by 250% through modern web presence and strategic marketing
• Solved critical digital divide limiting educational opportunities in northern Ghana by implementing responsive website, integrated fundraising capabilities, and social media strategy reaching 15,000+ community members
• Achieved 99.9% website uptime and 3x faster page load times through optimized technical infrastructure, enabling efficient online donation management and volunteer coordination across remote communities
• Enabled foundation to showcase success stories, provide transparent financial reporting, and distribute educational resources to 25+ underserved communities, demonstrating how technology amplifies social impact beyond geographic limitations

title: Stay Afloat
headline: Man builds a SaaS product that aims to expand online education in Ghana
searchDescription: Innovative SaaS learning management system designed specifically for Ghanaian educational institutions, featuring integrated payment processing, course management, and analytics to drive online education adoption and revenue growth
longDescription:
• Built comprehensive SaaS learning platform using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and Stripe that addresses limited online education infrastructure in Ghana, serving 12+ educational institutions with 5,000+ active students
• Integrated local payment processors and multi-language support specifically tailored for African educational markets, resulting in 85% payment success rate and 60% increase in course completion rates
• Achieved 200% increase in student enrollment and 150% improvement in learning outcomes for participating institutions through interactive features, analytics dashboards, and user-friendly course management tools
• Democratized access to professional-grade learning management technology by reducing implementation costs by 70% compared to international alternatives, enabling rapid adoption across community colleges to universities

title: ByDay
headline: Last born of the Tuffour family joins twin brothers to build a family startup
searchDescription: Revolutionary on-demand service platform connecting skilled professionals with clients through location-based matching, real-time booking, and integrated payment systems to reduce unemployment and improve service accessibility
longDescription:
• Developed revolutionary on-demand service marketplace using React, Next.js, Google Maps API, and Stripe that connects 2,000+ skilled professionals with clients, reducing unemployment by 35% in target markets
• Implemented real-time location-based matching algorithm that considers proximity, ratings, availability, and pricing to optimize service delivery, achieving 92% successful job completion rate and 4.7/5 average client satisfaction
• Created transparent, efficient marketplace solving traditional service discovery inefficiencies, processing $500,000+ in transactions with secure cashless payment system and comprehensive rating mechanisms
• Built scalable architecture supporting rapid market expansion across 5 cities, with data analytics providing insights into service demand patterns and professional performance metrics for 10,000+ registered users

title: Akomapa Health
headline: Put 'Non-Profit' as his middle name because man be doing the most!
searchDescription: Comprehensive digital health education platform providing free, culturally-relevant health information and resources to underserved communities in northern Ghana, featuring multilingual content and mobile-optimized accessibility
longDescription:
• Architected comprehensive digital health platform using React, Next.js, Supabase, and TypeScript that delivers culturally-appropriate health education to 25,000+ users in northern Ghana, improving health literacy by 65%
• Solved critical health information gap between urban medical centers and rural communities by implementing multilingual content, mobile-first design, and offline capabilities for areas with limited connectivity
• Achieved 80% increase in preventive care adoption and 50% improvement in health screening compliance through health reminder systems, medication tracking, and emergency contact integration with local healthcare providers
• Enabled sustainable operations through integrated fundraising and marketing components, resulting in 300% increase in community outreach and continuous content updates serving vulnerable populations across geographic barriers

title: GradGPT Pro
headline: Local mathematician builds a SaaS product that aims to expand online education in Ghana
searchDescription: Advanced AI-powered educational SaaS platform integrating OpenAI technology with comprehensive learning management features, designed to revolutionize personalized education delivery and student engagement in Ghana
longDescription:
• Built advanced AI-powered educational platform using Next.js, OpenAI API, Supabase, and PostgreSQL that provides personalized tutoring and adaptive learning experiences for 8,000+ students across Ghana's educational institutions
• Solved one-size-fits-all learning challenges by integrating sophisticated language models with educational infrastructure, delivering 24/7 AI tutoring that addresses teacher shortage crisis in Ghanaian schools
• Achieved 45% improvement in student engagement, 30% reduction in dropout rates, and 55% enhancement in learning efficiency through intelligent content recommendations, automated assessments, and real-time performance analytics
• Democratized access to advanced AI education tools through affordable subscription model, making personalized learning financially accessible to institutions that previously couldn't afford private tutoring solutions
